item.description:
Capitalize on the top 3 New Years resolutions

Tuesday, 7pm FDIY Corporate, 1 Industrial Dr., Windham, NH

My tax guy says that EVERYONE should own a home based business...here's why - http://wp.me/pNfNP-2A

What are your New Year's resolutions? Are you like everyone else?

Did you know the top 3 New Year's resolutions for 2012 are to:

Get out of Debt

Make more Money

Lose Weight and get healthy

We have the answer to all 3 with Youngevity and 90for LIFE!

To learn how you can use 90for LIFE to capitalize on the top 3 resolutions and to get out of debt, make more money, lose weight and get healthy yourself, be at this event!

Overview followed by a training. My accountant told me the other day that EVERYONE should own a home based business to get the tax benefits that are associated.

RSVP with Bernadette at 603-834-4587 or dette101@gmail.com to attend for free.
item.how_to_find_us: Middle entrance - training center door, upstairs

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth

item.name: Business overview - Why are we 90 for life?
